channel.title: blog.shr4pnel.com
channel.description: Ruminations on music, the world and whatever rubbish pops into my head delivered straight to you.

item.title: Music roundup #1: March 2024
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: Tyler fills your head with excellent excellent music free of charge. how does he find the time?

item.title: physical media: it ain't so bad!
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: tyler moans about how much they like their damn cds!

item.title: the great react rewrite of '24
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: i mope about how doing things 'the right way' is a pain in the ass.

item.title: suicide in art and philosophy
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: a delve into the theme of suicide, looking at the works of painters and philosophers through history

item.title: Switzerland 2023
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: photos of my trip to switzerland, lots of cows and trees to be seen here.

item.title: The death of Aaron Swartz, or: "fiction's about what it is to be a fucking human being"
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: Tyler covers the life and death of Aaron Swartz, a software pioneer and general near-savant who stuck to their principles to the end.

item.title: Diversifying tastes in music, or: "why you should be listening to good music instead of your music"
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: Tyler covers the riveting music scene and mentions a lot of niche bands and people you should listen to.

item.title: Infrastructure updates and web revival, or: "why the internet fucking sucks and will possibly forever"
item.author: admin@shr4pnel.com (big tyler)
item.description: a brief microarticle on my gripes with the modern web development scene as well as what social media has developed into.
